en.content: “So! I thought you looked like a snoop. Like what you found, did you?”
A burly villager fills the doorway, blocking out much of the daylight. You can make out a dark apron, and a thick beard. He steps forward, fist raised.

zh.content: “哟！我看你怎么偷偷摸摸的啊？喜不喜欢你的发现啊？”
一个结实的村民堵住了屋门，把太阳光差不多都挡住了。你能辨认出深色的围裙和一副大胡子。他向前迈步，抬起了拳头。
